mapper.select: SELECT T1.USER_ID AS userId, T1.USER_PASSWORD AS userPassword, T1.USER_LOCKED AS userLock, T3.ROLE_NAME AS roleName, T3.ROLE_ID AS roleId FROM sys_user T1, sys_user_role T2, sys_role T3 WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId} AND T1.USER_PASSWORD = #{userPassword} AND T2.USER_ID = T1.USER_ID AND T3.ROLE_ID = T2.ROLE_ID

SELECT T1.USER_ID AS userId, T2.ROLE_ID AS roleId, T2.ROLE_NAME AS roleName, T3.MENU_ID AS menuId, T3.MENU_ICON AS icon, T3.MENU_NAME AS menuName, T3.MENU_URL AS url
FROM sys_user T1, sys_role T2, sys_menu T3, sys_role_menu T4, sys_user_role T5 WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId} AND T2.ROLE_ID = #{roleId} AND T1.USER_ID = T5.USER_ID AND T2.ROLE_ID = T5.ROLE_ID AND T4.ROLE_ID = T2.ROLE_ID AND T4.MENU_ID = T3.MENU_ID AND T3.PARENT_MENU_ID = '0'

SELECT T1.USER_ID AS userId, T2.ROLE_ID AS roleId, T2.ROLE_NAME AS roleName, T3.MENU_ID AS menuId, T3.MENU_ICON AS icon, T3.MENU_NAME AS menuName, T3.MENU_URL AS url
FROM sys_user T1, sys_role T2, sys_menu T3, sys_role_menu T4, sys_user_role T5 WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId} AND T2.ROLE_ID = #{roleId} AND T1.USER_ID = T5.USER_ID AND T2.ROLE_ID = T5.ROLE_ID AND T4.ROLE_ID = T2.ROLE_ID AND T4.MENU_ID = T3.MENU_ID AND T3.PARENT_MENU_ID = #{menuId}
SELECT T1.MENU_ID AS menuId, T1.MENU_NAME AS menuName, T1.MENU_URL AS url, T1.MENU_ICON AS icon FROM sys_menu T1 WHERE T1.MENU_ID = #{menuId}

SELECT T1.USER_ID AS userId, T1.USER_NAME AS userName, T1.ORG_ID AS orgId, T1.USER_EMAIL AS userEmail, T1.USER_BITTHDAY AS userBirthday, T1.USER_ADDRESS AS userAddress, T1.USER_TEL AS userTel, T1.USER_MOBILE AS userMobile, T1.USER_LOCKED AS userLock FROM sys_user T1 WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT T3.ROLE_NAME AS roleName, T3.ROLE_ID AS roleId FROM sys_user_role T2, sys_role T3 WHERE T2.USER_ID =#{userId} AND T3.ROLE_ID = T2.ROLE_ID

SELECT T3.BUTTON_ID AS buttonId, T3.BUTTON_NAME buttonName, T3.BUTTON_PAGE_ID buttonPageId FROM sys_role T1, sys_role_function T2, sys_function T3 WHERE T1.ROLE_ID = T2.ROLE_ID AND T2.BUTTON_ID = T3.BUTTON_ID AND T1.ROLE_ID=#{roleId}
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user SET ATTEMTP = 0, LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{sys_date} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
